attributes.action: Improve  access to Southend on Sea & Shoeburyness
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Access to the east of Southend on Sea & the Shoeburyness area has become impossible, businesses are dying, industrial estates in disrepair, House building at an all time low, residents have had enough of sitting in traffic queues choking on fumes.we need access, a by-pass has become a matter of and death for residents and businesses, on top of these problems it is proposed to build a new football stadium and a waste transfer satation where oh where will all this extra traffic go? we need a BY-PASS now to allow Southend on Sea and Shoeburyness to grow and prosper again

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Improve access to Southend on Sea & Shoeburyness."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16961


Prime Minister's Office
